The columns in the output file called "step_5_data.txt" are as follows:

1.)  activity  -  This is the activity during which the data was collected

2.)  subject_id  -  this is the id of the person that data was collected upon.

3.)  avg_of_means  -  average of the means calulated grouped by activity and subject_id
